衉字的基本解释

衉
kè
古同“喀”，呕，吐。

衉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kè］
［《正字通》乞格切］
(1)咯；呕血。参见“衉血”。
(2)吐唾。参见“衉唾”。

衉字的康熙字典解释

【申集下】【血字部】　衉； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1107第19
【集韻】乞格切，音客。與䘔同。【晉語】鐵之戰，趙?子曰：鄭人擊我，吾伏弢衉血，鼓音不衰。【註】面汙血曰衉。【補音】衉，或作䘔，音客。【唐書·諸子建成傳】王暴疾，衉血數升。

考證：〔【楚語】鐵之戰。〕　謹照原書楚語改晉語。
衉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
衉字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
衉
kè
Gu Tong "Ka", vomiting, vomiting.
衉
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kè］
["Zhengzitong" Qigeche]
(1) Slightly; hematemesis. See "Nu's blood".
(2) Spit. See "衉 saliva".
衉
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 2] [Blood Character Department] 　衉; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1107 Page 19
[Jiyun] Qigeqi, Yinke. Same as you. [Jin dialect] The battle of iron, Zhao Zi said: Zheng hits me, I lay my blood, and the sound of the drums never fades. [Note] The face is dirty and bloody, and he said 衉. [Complement] 衉, or Zuo, Yinke. [Tang Shu·Zhu Zi Jian Jian Biography] Wang Boji, the blood counts liters. Textual research: [[Chu language] The Battle of Iron. 〕　I would like to change the Jin dialect according to the original Chu dialect.
